definitions: A salt containing the complex anion [Fe(CN)₅ NO]2−, obtained by treating a ferro or ferricyanide with nitric acid; especially such a salt (frequently sodium nitroprusside) used as a reagent in various analytical tests and as an emergency hypotensive agent.

notes.text: Nitroprussides contain the nitrosyl group, not the nitro group, and may be given more systematic names such as pentacyanonitrosylferrate.
